body_html:
looked briefly over the output and didn't see something wrong. Don't think you need a virtual env, at least my jenkins is happy without.
Is there a directory 'Testing' in the build directory ? (I think this is where ctest keeps the last result).
Getting logs in case of failure: I can add a --output-on-failure.
We added the full python path to cmake ... did you use the pip that goes with that python ?

body:
looked briefly over the output and didn't see something wrong. Don't think you need a virtual env, at least my jenkins is happy without.
Is there a directory 'Testing' in the build directory ? (I think this is where ctest keeps the last result).
Getting logs in case of failure: I can add a --output-on-failure.
We added the full python path to cmake ... did you use the pip that goes with that python ?
